verses.1: Hihte pen Solomonʼ paunakte ahi hi: Ta pil in a pa lungdamsak a, ta hai in a nu dahsak hi.
verses.2: Thuman loin ngahna ah phattuamna om lo a, thumanna in sih nading pan hong hon hi.
verses.3: Topa in mihoihte a gil kialin koih lo a, migilote a duh uh nesak lo hi.
verses.4: Thadahna in zawnna hi a, tha nuamna in hauhna hi.
verses.5: A hunin an a lapa mipil hi a, an lak hunin a ihmu pa in maizumna a ngah hi.
verses.6: Mihoihte in thupha ngah a, migilote in thusia bekbek gen hi.
verses.7: Mihoihte kiphawkphawk a, migilote kimangngilh pah hi.
verses.8: Mipilte in thuhilhna mang a, a hai paute in lungkhamna tuak hi.
verses.9: Thuman mite lungnuamin om hithiat a, thuman lote kiman hi.
verses.10: Khialhna kimuhmawh bawlna in buaina piangsak a, hang takin hilh ngamna in nopna piangsak hi.
verses.11: Mihoihteʼ kampaute pen nuntakna tuinak bang a, migilote in thusia bekbek gen uh hi.
verses.12: Muhdahna in kitotna piangsak a, itna in mawhna khempeuh maisak hi.
verses.13: Thungaihsun theiteʼ kam sungah pilna om a, mihaiteʼ nungzang ah ciangduai kinga hi.
verses.14: Mipilte in a pilna uh behlapin, mihaite a pau ciangin thusia tawh kizom pahpah hi.
verses.15: Hauhna in mihaute hu a, zawnna in mizawngte siasak hi.
verses.16: Mihoihteʼ thaman nuntakna hi a, migiloteʼ thaman siatna ahi hi.
verses.17: Kihilhna manna nuntak lampi zuihna hi a, hilhna man nop lohna lampi lauhuai zuihna ahi hi.
verses.18: Mi a mudahte bek in zuau thu gen a, mi a gensiate mihai ahi hi.
verses.19: Kam tam paute tampi khial a, pau ip theite mipil hi.
verses.20: Mihoihteʼ thugente ngun tang bang a, migiloteʼ ngaihsutnate in bangmah man lo hi.
verses.21: Mihoihteʼ thugente in mi tampi nuamtuamsak a, mihaite in a hai sihpih uh hi.
verses.22: Topaʼ thupha in mite hausak a, dahna le gimna tawh pia khawm lo hi.
verses.23: Mihaite in gamtat siat ding nuamsa uh a, thungaihsun theite in pil gamtatna nuamsa uh hi.
verses.24: Migilote tungah a kihtaktak uh tung a, mihoihte in a deihdeih uh ngah uh hi.
verses.25: Huihpi a nun ciangin migilote leen mang a, thuman mite lungmuangin om tawntung uh hi.
verses.26: Leenggahtui thuk in ha kimsak a, meikhu in mit a siipsak bangin, mi thadah in a cial pa a nasak hi.
verses.27: Topa zahtakna in khan sausak a, migilote khansih hi.
verses.28: Mihoihteʼ lametna lungdamna hi a, migiloteʼ lametna a hawmpi ahi hi.
verses.29: Topa in midikte hu a, migilote a susia hi.
verses.30: Midikte lungmuang takin om tawntung ding uh a, migilote in omna ding mun ngah zo lo ding uh hi.
verses.31: Midikte in pilna thu gen uh a, thu hoih lo a genteʼ leii ki-attan ding hi.
verses.32: Midikte in a gen ding uh thuhoih thei a, migilote in thusia bekbek gengen uh hi.
